# Adding the updated 2022 version from depmap of crispr data to the OnTarget previous version dataset file
<!-- Load the needed data -->
```{r}
require(magrittr)
require('tidyverse')
onTarget=readRDS('../Data/onTarget_v12.RDS')
CRISPR22Q2=read.csv('../Data/CRISPR_gene_effect.csv')
```
Load needed functions
```{r}
source('../3.Tools/myCustom_functions.R')
```

```{r, tidy = TRUE}
CRISPR22Q2 <- CRISPR22Q2 %>% set_rownames(.$DepMap_ID) %>% select(-1)
colnames(CRISPR22Q2) <- strsplit_customv0(colnames(CRISPR22Q2), infunc_split_by = '\\.')
onTarget$avana_22Q2 <- CRISPR22Q2
saveRDS(onTarget, '/Users/sinhas8/Project_TrueTarget/Data/onTarget_v2.0.RDS')
```
